#summary Maven coordinates and download statistics
#labels Featured

== Download for Maven Projects ==
Concurrent-Locks is in Maven Central, and can be added to a Maven project as follows:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.googlecode.concurrent-locks</groupId>
    <artifactId>concurrent-locks</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

== Download for Non-Maven Projects ==
The library can be downloaded directly from Maven Central [http://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=com/googlecode/concurrent-locks/concurrent-locks/ here].
